title: Taiwanese President Confirms U.S. Troop Deployment on Island
sub_head: Tsai Ing-wen notes a ‘range of cooperation’ with the U.S. on defense
body:
WASHINGTON—Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen acknowledged the presence of U.S. troops on the island, describing the deployment as part of broader defense cooperation with the U.S.
Ms. Tsai confirmed in a CNN interview a Wall Street Journal report this month that a small contingent of Marines and a special-operations unit had been training Taiwanese forces.
